item.title: Optimal line-length for publishing on the web
item.description: As you could probably tell from the general look and feel of this site, it derives some amount of inspiration from Medium1. The two important aspects that I find attractive on Medium are: Typography. The font pairings are easy on the eyes. Text width. Also easy on the eyes, but for a different reason. It seems to lend itself to easy reading. Linotype newspapers had narrow columns for practical reasons. Not necessarily the ergonomics of the reader, but rather the publisher.
